description: Ministry of Urban Development, Water Supply and Drainage - Order to approve the acquisition of the immovable properties in Ruwanpura, Harispattuwa D/S Division and Thalahena 1 and 2 allotments in Syston Seed Division Estate in Dippitiya, Akurana D/S Division all of Kandy District for the constructions under Kandy North-Pathadumbara Integrated Water Supply Project
